title: Everglades National Park: Eco Pond Sound Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Nature     Environmental Factors     Soundscape / Noise     Eco Pond Sound Gallery                  Eco Pond Sound Gallery         Aerial view of the Eco Pond Trail. NPS photo  Listen to a daytime chorus, a nighttime chorus, and a summer thunderstorm, all recorded at the Eco Pond acoustic monitoring site, which is located near the campground at Flamingo. The Eco Pond Trail is a popular bird watching area in the park.             Daytime Chorus     Listen to a daytime chorus recorded at the Eco Pond site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-28     Download Original File: ever-DayChorusEVER00620080828065422.mp32,747 KB                     Night Chorus     Listen to a nighttime chorus recorded at the Eco Pond site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-27     Download Original File: ever-NightChorusEVER00620080827024717.mp32,003 KB                     Thunderstorm     Listen to a summer thunderstorm recorded at the Eco Pond site.     Credit / Author: NPS Natural Sounds Program   Date created: 2008-08-27     Download Original File: ever-ThunderstormEVER006200808271544241.mp31,163 KB                Acoustic monitoring sites in Everglades National Park.
